Document.Title: Microsoft Money 2006 Standard PROBLEM: "You cannot change the credit limit for a credit card account in Money 2005 Standard or in Money Standard 2006"

Content:
The title of the article is self-explanatory: "You cannot change the credit limit for a credit card account in Money 2005 Standard or in Money Standard 2006." As of this writing, the article is here:

   http://support.microsoft.com/?scid=kb;en-us;914968
